content.p: Our teams are located in the Portland Building (Arts and Social Sciences) and the Pope Building (Science and Engineering), Life Sciences Buidling (Medicine and Health Sciences) on University Park, QMC (Medicine and Health Sciences), Yang Fujia Building on Jubilee campus and the Student Services Centre at Sutton Bonington. You can talk to a member of our team about your career plans by: Follow us on Instagram Read our blog Our Portland Building office (Level D West, above the Student Services Centre) is open between 9am and 5pm, Monday to Friday. You can also contact us by sending us an email or phoning the office on 0115 95 13680 during our opening hours. If you would like to speak to a specific member of staff, please use Our team page for their details. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
